mapper.select: SELECT r.* from t_amz_adv_report_request r INNER JOIN ( SELECT MAX(api.reportId) reportId FROM t_amz_adv_report_request api where treat_number < 10 and (treat_status is null or treat_status='error' or treat_status='') and requesttime >= DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -72 HOUR) AND api.profileId= #{profileid,jdbcType=CHAR} and isrun=0 GROUP BY api.campaignType,api.recordType,IFNULL(api.segment,'#'),IFNULL(api.segment,'#') ORDER BY api.requesttime asc ) v ON v.reportId =r.reportId

SELECT from t_amz_adv_report_request where reportId IN ( select MAX(r.reportId) reportId from t_amz_adv_report_request r left join t_amz_adv_profile p on r.profileid=p.id WHERE (r.treat_status is null or r.treat_status='error' or r.treat_status='' or treat_status='requestreportbyprofile') and r.treat_number<10 and r.requesttime>=DATE_ADD(now(),INTERVAL -12 HOUR) group BY p.advauthId ) order by byday DESC,requesttime desc
